Lists.desc: Fixed psycopg_pool module fix
Lists.details: • Fixed an issue where connections were not returned to the pool when calling pool_connection manually.

Lists.desc: Fixed psycopg module fix
Lists.details: • Fixed a conflict issue that occurred with certain logic when used with psycopg2.

Lists.desc: Fixed ACTIVE_STATUS monitoring function fix
Lists.details: • Fixed an issue where ACTIVE_STATUS data was being sent unnecessarily.

Lists.desc: Fixed Updated the fastapi module
Lists.details: • Fixed an issue where certain functions executed more than once

Lists.desc: Fixed Updated the httpx module
Lists.details: • Fixed a tracing error that occurred when invoked in streaming mode

Lists.desc: Fixed Updated the psycopg module
Lists.details:
• Fixed an error when accessing the rowcount attribute

  • Improved stability of the logic for extracting connection information

Lists.desc: Fixed Fixed an issue where Container ID was not mapped in Kubernetes container environments
Lists.details:
Caution

    Supported from Kubernetes agent v1.8.8 or higher

Lists.desc: New Added @step_id field for LLM log monitoring
New Added LLM metrics collection feature
Lists.details:
• llm_stat_enabled Boolean

    • false: default
    • true: metrics collection is enabled only when this option, trace_llm_log_enabled, and counter_thread_enabled are all set to true

  • llm_stat_interval Number

    • Option to set the LLM metrics collection interval in seconds
    • 5: default

Lists.desc: Feature Added counter_thread_enabled option Boolean
Lists.details:
• false: default

  • true: activates the thread (counter_thread) that collects llm_stat and app_filedescriptor metrics

Lists.desc: Changed Improved stability of the psycopg_pool tracing module
Changed Improved asynchronous tracing stability for both psycopg and psycopg_pool modules
Changed The open_file_descriptor_enabled option no longer affects whether counter_thread is enabled
New Added tracing support for psycopg_pool module
Fixed Updated sqlAlchemy module
Lists.details: • Fixed an issue where query parameters of the asyncmy driver were not being substituted

Lists.desc: New psycopg module tracing feature added
New You can now specify the path to the whatap_python executable using the WHATAP_PYTHON_AGENT_PATH environment variable
Lists.details: • If this environment variable is not set, it defaults to WHATAP_HOME

Lists.desc: Fixed neo4j module modification
Lists.details: • Fixed an issue where the DB connection timing was not being collected correctly

Lists.desc: New Added sqlite3 module tracing feature
Fixed Fixed issue where DB Connection was displayed redundantly
Lists.details: • Fixed an issue where the DB Connection Step was displayed in Step view even when only a DB query was executed

Lists.desc: New Added tracing support for the httpx module
New Added tracing support for the openai module
Lists.details:
• trace_llm_log_enabled Boolean

    Default: false


    true: Enables tracing of OpenAI API calls via log monitoring

Lists.desc: New Added whatap_code_start option Boolean Default: false
Lists.details: • When set to true, you can run import whatap followed by whatap.agent() in sitecustomize.py, enabling agent startup without the whatap-start-agent command using only the default Python execution.

Lists.desc: Fixed Modified open_file_descriptor_enabled option Boolean
Lists.details: • When set to false, the thread that tracks file descriptors is also disabled.

Lists.desc: New Added an option to display the original URL in step traces when URL normalization is applied
Lists.details:
• step_origin_url_enabled Boolean

    Default: false

Lists.desc: New Added tracing options for standalone Python processes
Lists.details:
• standalone_enabled Boolean

    Default: false

  • standalone_type String


    single-transaction: Default. Monitors as a single transaction


    multiple-transaction: Allows transaction tracing at the module, class, or method level

  • standalone_transaction_patterns String


    No default value


    Format: [MODULE]:[CLASS].[FUNC] or [MODULE]:[FUNC]


    Example: myPackage:MyClass.__init__, myPackage:my_function

Lists.desc: New Added tracing support for the Neo4j driver module (v5.0 and above)
Fixed Fixed an issue where the original URL was not displayed in record summaries when URL normalization was applied
New Added options related to the app_context_stat matrix category in whatap.conf
Lists.details:
• app_context_enabled Boolean

    Default: false


    Set to true to enable the full app_context_stat collection feature

  • app_context_parser


    default: Default parser (extracts the first path segment)


    prefix: Prefix matching parser (most flexible)


    match: Exact matching parser (matches only completely)

  • app_context_parser_reset Number

    Default: 0


    A counter that forcibly resets the parserâ€™s internal cache and configuration

  • app_context_path_depth Number

    Default: 1


    Specifies the depth of the path segment to extract from the URL (used only with the default parser)

  • app_context_path_set String

    No default value


    Defines a mapping of paths to monitor and their corresponding names (separated by commas ,)


    Example: name1@url1,name2@url2,url3,name4@url4

Lists.desc: Fixed Fixed an issue where fastAPI was called without StreamingResponse
New Added the Odoo framework (v16,v17) tracing feature.
Fixed Fixed the SQLAlchemy related errors.
Lists.details:
• Fixed the issue where query messages are duplicated due to conflicts with the DB driver while being traced.
  • Fixed the issue where parameters are not bound in query statements.
  • Fixed the issue where an error occurs when the user value is not entered when connecting to the DB.

Lists.desc: Fixed Fixed the issue where exceptional objects other than Flask are not handled properly.
Fixed Fixed the issue where the ignore_whatap_stdout option has not been applied.
New Added the WebSocket transmission tracing feature based on starlette.
New Added the feature to collect and display normal signals (Status: 2xx, 3xx) for HTTP transactions.
New Added the feature to collect and display request methods for HTTP transactions.
New Added the HTTP status collection and display feature when an HTTP transaction error occurs.
New Added the option to control whatap module's log output in whatap.conf.
Lists.details:
• ignore_whatap_stdout Boolean

    Default false

    If it is set to true, all standard output logs from the WhaTap Python agent module are disabled.

Lists.desc: New Added the tracing of mtid values in the logging module (logging, loguru) monitoring.
Lists.details:
• trace_logging_mtid_enabled Boolean

    Default false

    It is enabled if the trace_logging_enabled value is true, while it is output in the log if the mtid value exists.

  • trace_loguru_mtid_enabled Boolean

    Default false

    It is enabled if the trace_loguru_enabled value is true, while it is output in the log if the mtid value exists.

Lists.desc: Fixed Fixed the issue where it is not reraised when an exception occurs in Celery Task.
New Added the automatic search and configuration of the whatap.conf file when the WHATAP_HOME environment variables are not set.
Fixed Fixed the issue where MySQL and PostgreSQL database error messages are displayed incorrectly.
Fixed Fixed the issue where no response is received when retrieving data after connection in Redis single mode.
Fixed Changed Redis to monitor only specific functions: GET, SET, DEL, HSET, HGET.
Fixed Fixed the SQL profile transmission error.
Fixed Fixed the error in the RabbitMQ monitoring module (pika).
Lists.details: The pika original function execution error was fixed.
